qas.question: Where is the Uruguayan Basketball League headquartered?
When was the Golf Club of Punta Carretas founded?
Equestrianism regained importance in Montevideo after what?

context: The Uruguayan Basketball League is headquartered in <a0_0>Montevideo<a0_0/> and most of its teams are from the city, including Defensor Sporting, Biguá, Aguada, Goes, Malvín, Unión Atlética, and Trouville. Montevideo is also a centre of rugby; equestrianism, which regained importance in Montevideo after <a2_0>the Maroñas Racecourse reopened<a2_0/>; golf, with the Club de Punta Carretas; and yachting, with the Puerto del Buceo, an ideal place to moor yachts. The Golf Club of Punta Carretas was founded in <a1_0>1894<a1_0/> covers all the area encircled by the west side of Bulevar Artigas, the Rambla (Montevideo's promenade) and the Parque Rodó (Fun Fair).
